setStudentId(e.target.value)} /> {isMarksDisplayed && ( <> )}

) : showNoDataMessage ? (

setNewMark({ ...newMark, student_id: e.target.value })} /> setNewMark({ ...newMark, telugu: e.target.value })} /> setNewMark({ ...newMark, english: e.target.value })} /> setNewMark({ ...newMark, science: e.target.value })} /> setNewMark({ ...newMark, maths: e.target.value })} /> setNewMark({ ...newMark, social: e.target.value })} /> setNewMark({ ...newMark, exam_date: e.target.value })} />
